name: Child Language Disorders
description: Students are introduced to the etiologies and characteristics of speech and language disorders in children, associated with autism, intellectual disabilities, and specific language impairment. Theoretical underpinnings of the major intervention approaches for children with speech and language disorders are discussed. (Given by the Departments of Linguistics and Speech Language Pathology)
prerequisites: LIN101H1, LIN102H1, LIN228H1, and 1 FCE at the 300+ level
